Title: My Journey, My Life
Structure:
• 분사구문
Reading his books, I found myself fascinated by his interesting stories.

Title: Art Around Us
Structure:
• 「It is/was … that」 강조
It was around the turn of the 20th century that Rousseau's paintings began to attract some young artists.

Title: Toward a Better Environment
Structure:
• 「with+명사+분사」
With the mixture growing in the mold, the mushroom packaging takes the shape of the mold.

Title: Living Together
Structure:
• 「so that ~ can/could ...」
The organization distributes the food to shelters so that they can feed the hungry.

Title: Culture as a Mirror of Our Lives
Structure:
• 관계대명사 계속적 용법
They replaced it with marble, which is the same material as the original stone.

Title: Technology, What Defines Us as Humans
Structure:
• 도치
As I have evolved, so has my understanding of the Three Laws.

Title: My School Days
Structure:
• 「의문사+to부정사」
During lunch break, we discussed whom to thank.

Title: Discover Cultures Around the World
Structure:
• 관계부사
That is why Ifrane is often referred to as "Morocco's Switzerland."

Title: Future of Money
Structure:
• 동명사의 관용적 표현
She had trouble following my instructions.

Title:
Bring Literature
into Your Life
Structure:
• 접속사 if
He wondered if he should take back the shard, which the emissary had placed carefully on the table.

Title: ICT in Our Lives
Structure:
• 접속사 while
The amount of food produced can be maximized, while the impact on the environment can be minimized.

Title:
Reach Beyond
Ourselves
Structure:
• 병렬 구조
The time has now come for the nation to turn a new page in Australia's history by righting the wrongs and so moving forward.
